Package gov.nasa.jpl.aerie.merlin.protocol

Annotation Interface Capability

public @interface Capability
A Capability has object identity. Instances of a Capability type can be distinguished from other instances even if they would otherwise be observationally indistinguishable. A capability is distinguished from a mere trait in that a capability may itself be passed to the service provider via methods on another trait. The service provider needs to be able to verify that the capability it receives is indeed one it produced, and not a forgery or produced by a different provider of the same service.
